aircraft.value: Hornet Strike - AC-3582-332 at Training Center Beta

defect_observed.value: Ballistics computer calculation error. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Targeting System component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 13/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 14/06/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 17/06/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 20/06/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 19/06/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh
